Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. La classe Room a pour but de generer tout les element du scenario (piece, item ...) et toute l'interface graphique
    Version:
    2017.10.23
    Author:
    Espinasse Baptiste
